entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List patterns: x is [..var y] with a custom collection type causes a crash #59466
  • List patterns: no error is emitted when Length is missing or inaccessible #59465
  • NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider.ProvideCompletionsAsync #59463
  • Test plan for CheckedUserDefinedOperators feature #59458
  • Implement LSP breakpoint placement request #59455
    17.2
  • compile error when using function pointer in Expression<> #59454
  • ToString format specifier completion for Guid shows DateTime specifiers instead #59453
  • Pattern matching null check should be eliminated if has been checked #59449

Closed

  • VS 2017 C# redundant assignment suggestion not shown #50059
    Backlog
  • [Flaky Test] CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.AddUsingExactMatchBeforeRenameTracking #57982
    17.1
  • IntelliSense for LINQ function to suggest predicates #50333
    Backlog
  • Requests for the "inline parameter name hints" feature #51161
    Backlog
  • VS grey out the whole expression when using extra parentheses #51813
    Backlog
  • No Justification info in sarif 2.1. #48972
    Backlog
  • IDE0054 false positive in object initializer #52112
    Backlog
  • Simplify new expression (IDE0090) inappropriately raised for ASP.NET MVC 6 project. #52301
    Backlog
  • Compound Assignment Operator does not highlight #54208
    Backlog
  • Struct generated by "convert to struct" refactoring should implement "IEquatable<T>", operator== and operator != #54767
    Backlog
  • Consider having quick info for lambdas show the natural type of the lambda #54792
    Backlog
  • Intellisense does not work on pointers passed into functions #54919
    Backlog
  • Intellisense doesn't work on pointers in the context of parameters #58081
    Backlog
  • Copy method summary for abstract methods (c#) #54928
    Backlog
  • Convert to switch statement changes behavior #55938
    Backlog
  • File-scoped namespace puts semicolon on newline if a comment exists #56232

PullRequests

Created

  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Remove nonsensical nullability attributes when implementing interfaces. #59467
    Area-IDE
  • Improve 'use pattern matching' to use `is null` instead of `is not object` #59464
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inverting TypeOf should support 'TypeOf x IsNot...' #59460
    Area-IDE
  • Generate proper explicit interface impls #59459
    Area-IDE
  • Remove integration tests that are already ported to the new project #59457
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Improve trivia handling in use-block body. #59448
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use 'var' when fixing the return type of method #59447
    Area-IDE
  • Pass exception into internal error diagnostic #59443
    Area-Interactive
  • Classify interface static constructors #59442
    Area-IDE
  • Batch file notifications and acquire locks asynchronously #59441
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #59468
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Support raw UTF8 String Literals #59390
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Update BuildValidator to exclude refint folders. #59462
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Build with last released VS2022 in CI #59444
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix completion not working for pointer-typed parameters #59143
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use implicit object creation on nullable struct types #59438
    Area-IDE
  • Fxi mispeeling #59440
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Include record primary constructor props in nav-to when not backed by a corresponding field/prop. #59437
    Area-IDE
  • 'Add selected parameters to constructor' should respect existing user formatting #59432
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with implicit object initializers #59430
    Area-IDE
  • Move option to right category #59425
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE
  • Change json detection from a suggestion to a refactoring #59422
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the titles we show the user for the 'use is null' fixers #59409
    Area-IDE
  • Move cancellation catch up out of the navigate to searcher #59439
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry 16.4.29 #59426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Avoid directly exposing temporary storage streams #59431
    Area-IDE
  • Move net450 targets to net462 #59350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
